alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Yuma County through 545 PM MDT... At 512 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Eckley, or 8 miles northeast of Yuma, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eckley around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
